name: Romeo Santos
description: '''Anthony''' "'''Romeo'''" '''Santos''' (born July 21, 1981) is an American singer, songwriter, and record producer. He first rose to prominence as the lead vocalist and frontman of the [[bachata (music)|bachata]] group [[Aventura (band)|Aventura]], one of the most influential [[Latin music]] bands of the 2000s. Santos later established a successful solo career, achieving seven number-one songs on ''Billboard''{{'}}s [[Hot Latin Songs]] chart and eighteen number-one hits on the [[Tropical Airplay]] chart. He has sold over 24 million records worldwide, making him one of the [[List of best-selling Latin music artists|best-selling Latin music artists]] of all time.
